languages.text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.
languages.original_text: Сражаясь в бою ваш персонаж может потерять пункты {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. После нападения Кунрада ваш персонаж получил {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}. Такое происходит, когда персонаж за раунд получает урон больше 50% от максимального количества своего здоровья (процент зависит от выбранного уровня сложности игры). Ранения снижают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажей. Когда персонаж впервые получает ранение, оно считается свежим в течение трех раундов. После этого оно становится старым ранением. Свежие ранения можно вылечить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} без дополнительных проверок. Старые ранения исцеляются медкомплектом, однако требуют дополнительной проверки {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}навыка Медицина{/g}. Используйте медкомплект, чтобы восстанавливать здоровье и исцелять ранения. Обратите внимание: когда здоровье персонажа падает до нуля, он теряет сознание.

traits.locale_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their maximum wounds within one round. Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without making any skill tests. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae skill{/g} test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall unconscious.

While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their maximum wounds within one round. Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without making any skill tests. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae skill{/g} test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall unconscious.

Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall unconscious.

Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall unconscious.

While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

languages.text: Сражаясь в бою ваш персонаж может потерять пункты {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}. После нападения Кунрада ваш персонаж получил {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g}. Такое происходит, когда персонаж за раунд получает урон больше 50% от максимального количества своего здоровья (процент зависит от выбранного уровня сложности игры). Ранения снижают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажей. Когда персонаж впервые получает ранение, оно считается свежим в течение трех раундов. После этого оно становится старым ранением. Свежие ранения можно вылечить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} без дополнительных проверок. Старые ранения исцеляются медкомплектом, однако требуют дополнительной проверки {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}навыка Медицина{/g}. Используйте медкомплект, чтобы восстанавливать здоровье и исцелять ранения. Обратите внимание: когда здоровье персонажа падает до нуля, он теряет сознание.

Mientras lucha, tu personaje puede perder {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Tu personaje ha sufrido una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} como consecuencia del ataque de Kunrad. Esto sucede cuando un personaje recibe daño que supera el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} (el porcentaje exacto varía en función de la dificultad elegida). Las lesiones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje. Cuando un personaje sufre una lesión, se considera una lesión reciente durante los primeros tres asaltos. Una vez pasan tres asaltos, una lesión pasa a considerarse una lesión vieja. Una lesión reciente puede curarse con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} sin necesidad de superar ninguna {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g}. Las lesiones viejas se pueden tratar con un botiquín, pero requieren que el personaje que administra el tratamiento supere una prueba de habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} para conseguirlo. Usa botiquines para restaurar las heridas y curar lesiones. Ten en cuenta que si un personaje pierde todas sus heridas, quedará {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}."
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras lucha, tu personaje puede perder {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}. Tu personaje ha sufrido una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} como consecuencia del ataque de Kunrad. Esto sucede cuando un personaje recibe daño que supera el 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Las lesiones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje. Cuando un personaje sufre una lesión, se considera una lesión fresca durante los primeros tres asaltos. Una vez pasan tres asaltos, una lesión pasa a considerarse una lesión vieja. Una lesión fresca puede curarse con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g} sin necesidad de superar ninguna {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} . Las lesiones viejas se pueden tratar con un botiquín, pero requieren que el personaje que administra el tratamiento supere una prueba de habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} para conseguirlo. Usa botiquines para restaurar las heridas y curar lesiones. Ten en cuenta que si un personaje pierde todas sus heridas, quedará {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘中、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷への耐久力{/g}の一部を失うことがある。クンラッドの攻撃を受けてキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}した。これは、キャラクターが1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}以内に{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}傷への最大耐久力{/g}の50%を超えるダメージを受けたときに起こる（キャラが負うダメージの割合は選択した難易度によって異なる場合がある）。負傷はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を弱める。 キャラクターが最初に負傷した場合、最初の3ラウンドはその負傷は新しい負傷とみなされる。3ラウンドを過ぎると、新しい負傷は古い負傷となる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すれば、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格せずとも負傷を治すことができる。古い負傷はメディキットで治すことができるが、成功させるには治療を施すキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキル判定に合格しなければならない。 メディキットで傷を回復し、負傷を治そう。 傷への耐久力がすべてなくなると、{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になるので要注意だ。
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の一部を失うことがある。クンラッドの攻撃を受けてキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}した。これは、キャラクターが1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}以内に{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷{/g}の50%を超えるダメージを受けたときに起こる。負傷はキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決意{/g}を弱める。 キャラクターが最初に負傷した場合、最初の3ラウンドはその負傷は新しい負傷とみなされる。3ラウンドを過ぎると、新しい怪我は古い怪我となる。{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用すれば、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}に合格せずに怪我を治すことができる。古い傷はメディキットで治すことができるが、成功させるには治療を施すキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキルテストに合格しなければならない。 メディキットで傷を回復し、怪我を治す。 負傷がすべてなくなると、{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になるので注意。

languages.text: 在战斗的过程中，您的角色可能会失去部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。比如，您的角色遭到了昆拉德的攻击，承受了一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。当角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}轮{/g}内承受的伤害超过{g|Encyclopedia:Round}最大生命值{/g}的50%时，就会承受伤势。伤势会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。（在游戏中，触发“伤势”的生命值损失比例取决于游戏难度。） 当角色受伤时，这个伤势在接下来的三回合内会被视为新伤。三回合之后，新伤就会变成旧伤。新伤可以直接使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}进行治疗，无需进行任何{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。旧伤也可以使用医疗包来治疗，但治疗者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能检定，才能成功治愈伤势。 您可以使用医疗包来恢复生命值，治疗伤势。 请注意，当某个角色生命值降为0时，就会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 在战斗的过程中，您的角色可能会失去部分{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。比如，您的角色遭到了昆拉德的攻击，承受了一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。当角色在一{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}轮{/g}内承受的伤害超过{g|Encyclopedia:Round}最大生命值{/g}的50%时，就会承受伤势。伤势会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。 当角色受伤时，这个伤势在接下来的三回合内会被视为新伤。三回合之后，新伤就会变成旧伤。新伤可以直接使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}进行治疗，无需进行任何{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。旧伤也可以使用医疗包来治疗，但治疗者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能检定，才能成功治愈伤势。 您可以使用医疗包来恢复生命值，治疗伤势。 请注意，当某个角色生命值降为0时，就会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态。

languages.text: Während eines Kampfes kann dein Charakter einige seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verlieren. Dein Charakter hat eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erlitten, nachdem er von Kunrad angegriffen wurde. Das passiert, wenn ein Charakter innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} Schaden nimmt, der mehr als 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} überschreitet (der genaue Prozentsatz der Wunden, die ein Charakter dafür verlieren muss, kann je nach gewähltem Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren). Verletzungen verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Charakters. Wenn ein Charakter zum ersten Mal eine Verletzung erleidet, gilt sie in den ersten drei Runden als frische Verletzung. Sobald drei Runden vergangen sind, wird eine frische Verletzung zu einer alten Verletzung. Eine frische Verletzung kann mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} geheilt werden, ohne eine {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} zu bestehen. Alte Verletzungen können mit einem Medikit geheilt werden, aber dafür muss der Charakter, der die Behandlung durchführt, eine Probe auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fertigkeit bestehen, um erfolgreich zu sein. Verwende Medikits, um Wunden zu behandeln und Verletzungen zu heilen. Beachte, dass ein Charakter, der alle Wunden verloren hat, {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird.
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während eines Kampfes kann dein Charakter einige seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} verlieren. Dein Charakter hat eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} erlitten, nachdem er von Kunrad angegriffen wurde – das passiert, wenn ein Charakter innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} Schaden nimmt, der mehr als 50% seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} überschreitet. Verletzungen verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Charakters. Wenn ein Charakter zum ersten Mal eine Verletzung erleidet, gilt sie in den ersten drei Runden als frische Verletzung. Sobald drei Runden vergangen sind, wird eine frische Verletzung zu einer alten Verletzung. Eine frische Verletzung kann mit einem {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g} geheilt werden, ohne eine {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeits-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} zu bestehen. Alte Verletzungen können mit einem Medikit geheilt werden, aber dafür muss der Charakter, der die Behandlung durchführt, eine Probe auf die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fähigkeit bestehen, um erfolgreich zu sein. Verwende Medikits, um Wunden zu behandeln und Verletzungen zu heilen. Beachte, dass ein Charakter, der alle Wunden verloren hat, {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g} wird.

languages.text: Au combat, votre personnage peut perdre une partie de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Votre personnage a subi une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} après avoir été attaqué par Kunrad, ce qui se produit lorsqu'un personnage subit des dégâts dépassant 50 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (le pourcentage exact de blessures qu'un personnage doit perdre pour que cela se produise peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté choisi). Les lésions réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage. Lorsqu'un personnage subit une lésion pour la première fois, elle est considérée comme une lésion récente pendant les trois premiers rounds. Au terme de ces trois rounds, une lésion récente devient une lésion ancienne. Une lésion récente peut être soignée à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} sans avoir à réussir de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g}. Les lésions anciennes peuvent être soignées à l'aide d'un médikit, mais le personnage qui administre le traitement doit réussir un test de compétence de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Utilisez les médikits pour soigner les lésions. Notez que lorsqu'un personnage perd toute sa réserve de blessures, il {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}.
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Pendant le combat, votre personnage peut perdre certaines de ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}. Votre personnage a subi une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessures{/g} après avoir été attaqué par Kunrad, ce qui se produit lorsqu'un personnage subit des dégâts qui dépassent 50 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximales{/g} au cours d’un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les blessures réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage. Lorsqu'un personnage subit une blessure pour la première fois, elle est considérée comme une nouvelle blessure pendant les trois premiers rounds. Au terme de ces trois rounds, une nouvelle blessure devient une blessure ancienne. Une blessure récente peut être soignée à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} sans avoir à réussir de {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g}. Les blessures anciennes peuvent être soignées à l'aide d'un médikit, mais le personnage qui administre le traitement doit réussir un test de compétence {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Utilisez les médikits pour soigner les blessures. Notez que lorsqu'un personnage perd toute sa réserve de blessures, il {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}perd connaissance{/g}.

languages.text: Karakterin savaşırken {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlığının{/g} bir kısmını yitirebilir. Karakterin, Kunrad'ın saldırısından dolayı {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} geçiriyor. Bu durum, karakter bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} içinde {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlığının{/g} %50'sini aşan miktarda hasar aldığında gerçekleşir (bunun meydana gelmesi için karakterin kaybetmesi gereken sağlık yüzdesi, oyunun zorluğuna bağlı olarak değişebilir). Sakatlıklar, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini düşürür. Bir karakter sakatlandığında, bu sakatlık ilk üç raunt boyunca taze sakatlık olarak kabul edilir. Üç raunt geçtikten sonra, taze sakatlık eski sakatlığa dönüşür. Taze bir sakatlık, herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}yetenek{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} girmeden {g|ib:Medikit}sıhhiye çantasıyla{/g} tedavi edilebilir. Eski sakatlıklar da sıhhiye çantasıyla iyileştirilebilir ancak tedaviyi uygulayan karakterin başarılı olması için {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Sıhhiye{/g} yeteneği testini geçmesi gerekir. Sağlığı tazelemek ve sakatlıkları iyileştirmek için sıhhiye çantası kullan. Bir karakter tüm sağlık puanlarını yitirirse {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygınlık{/g} geçireceğini unutma.
languages.original_text: While fighting, your character can lose some of their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}. Your character has suffered an {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} after being attacked by Kunrad — this happens when a character receives damage that exceeds 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce the character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. When a character initially suffers an injury, it is considered a fresh injury during the first three rounds. Once three rounds have passed, a fresh injury becomes an old injury. A fresh injury can be healed using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g} without passing any {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Old injuries can be healed with a medikit, but they require the character administering the treatment to pass a {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test to succeed. Use medikits to restore wounds and heal injuries. Note that when a character loses all of their wounds, they fall {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}.
